skills.name: Deadly Venom
skills.blurb: Twitch's basic attacks infect the target, dealing true damage each second.
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Twitch's''' [[basic attack]]s {{tip|on-hit}} apply a stack of ''Deadly Venom'' for 6 seconds, stacking up to 6 times, during which the target is also inflicted with {{tip|poison}}. The duration of ''Deadly Venom'' refreshes on subsequent applications.

Each ''Deadly Venom'' stack deals{{ft|{{as|{{pp|1 to 5 for 5|1 to 17|formula=1 every 4 levels}}|true damage}} {{as|(+ {{fd|2.5}}% AP)}} {{sti|true damage|{{as|true damage}}}} per second over 6 seconds,|{{as|{{pp|1*6 to 5*6 for 5|1 to 17|formula=1 every 4 levels}}|true damage}} {{as|(+ {{#expr:2.5*6}}% AP)}} {{sti|true damage|{{as|'''total''' true damage}}}} over 6 seconds,}}for a maximum of{{ft|{{as|{{pp|1*6 to 5*6 for 5|1 to 17|formula=6 every 4 levels}}|true damage}} {{as|(+ {{#expr:2.5*6}}% AP)}} {{as|true damage}} with each tick|{{as|{{pp|1*6*6 to 5*6*6 for 5|1 to 17|formula=6 every 4 levels}}|true damage}} {{as|(+ {{#expr:2.5*6*6}}% AP)}} {{as|'''total''' true damage}} over the duration}}at 6 stacks.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Twitch's basic attacks on-hit apply a stack of Deadly Venom for 6 seconds, stacking up to 6 times, during which the target is also inflicted with poison. The duration of Deadly Venom refreshes on subsequent applications.
Each Deadly Venom stack dealsfor a maximum ofat 6 stacks.
skills.notes:
* The enhanced attacks will apply other on-hit effects and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal (the bonus damage cannot).
* ''Deadly Venom'' does not affect [[structures]].
* ''Deadly Venom'' cannot be {{ai|Riposte|Fiora|parried}} nor {{tip|blocked}} but can be {{tip|dodged}} and/or missed if '''Twitch''' is {{tip|blind|blinded}}.

skills.name: Ambush
skills.blurb: Twitch becomes Camouflaged for a short duration and gains Movement Speed. When leaving Camouflage, Twitch gains Attack Speed for a short duration. When an enemy champion with Deadly Venom dies, Ambush's cooldown is reset.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} After a 1 second delay, '''Twitch''' becomes {{tip|camouflage|camouflaged}} for a duration. Attacking or casting {{ai|Venom Cask|Twitch}} or {{ai|Contaminate|Twitch}} breaks the stealth immediately.

While stealthed, '''Twitch''' gains {{sti|ms|{{as|10% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}}, increased to {{as|30%|ms}} when he moves toward enemy {{tip|champions}} within a 1000-range radius who cannot see him.
Upon breaking stealth '''Twitch''' gains {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} for 5 seconds.
''Ambush's'' {{sti|cooldown}} is reset if an enemy champion dies while afflicted with {{ai|Deadly Venom|Twitch}}.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: After a 1 second delay, Twitch becomes camouflaged for a duration. Attacking or casting Twitch's Venom Cask or Twitch's Contaminate breaks the stealth immediately.
While stealthed, Twitch gains 10% bonus movement speed, increased to 30% when he moves toward enemy champions within a 1000-range radius who cannot see him.
Upon breaking stealth Twitch gains bonus attack speed for 5 seconds.
Ambush's cooldown is reset if an enemy champion dies while afflicted with Twitch's Deadly Venom.
skills.notes:
* Entering stealth cancels '''Twitch's''' current basic attack.
* ''Ambush'' follows the same rules as stealth but he can still perform actions normally before entering {{tip|camouflage}}. Activating {{si|Recall}} during the 1-second delay allows him to {{tip|channel}} it while stealthed.
* If '''Twitch''' enters {{tip|stasis}} during the delay, he will gain the {{tip|camouflage}} after the stasis ends.

skills.name: Venom Cask
skills.blurb: Twitch hurls a cask of venom that explodes in an area, slowing targets and applying deadly venom to the target.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Twitch''' hurls a cask of venom at the target location, applying a {{ai|Deadly Venom|Twitch}} to all enemies hit within the area and granting {{tip|sight}} of the area.
The area then becomes contaminated for 3 seconds, applying a {{ai|Deadly Venom|Twitch}} stack each second to all enemies within and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Twitch hurls a cask of venom at the target location, applying a Twitch's Deadly Venom to all enemies hit within the area and granting sight of the area.
The area then becomes contaminated for 3 seconds, applying a Twitch's Deadly Venom stack each second to all enemies within and slowing them.
skills.notes: * ''Venom Cask'' can apply a maximum of 4 {{ai|Deadly Venom|Twitch}} stacks per enemy.

skills.name: Contaminate
skills.blurb: Twitch wreaks further havoc on poisoned enemies with a blast of his vile diseases.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Twitch''' sends out a lethal toxin to each nearby enemy afflicted by {{ai|Deadly Venom|Twitch}}, dealing each of them {{as|physical damage}} upon arrival.
''Contaminate'' deals additional {{as|physical damage}} and {{as|{{fd|33.3}}% AP}} {{as|magic damage}} for each stack of {{ai|Deadly Venom|Twitch}} on the target.
''A nearby enemy with {{ai|Deadly Venom|Twitch}} is required to cast this ability, and targets do not have to be {{tip|sight|visible}} to be affected.''
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Twitch sends out a lethal toxin to each nearby enemy afflicted by Twitch's Deadly Venom, dealing each of them physical damage upon arrival.
Contaminate deals additional physical damage and 33.3% AP magic damage for each stack of Twitch's Deadly Venom on the target.
A nearby enemy with Twitch's Deadly Venom is required to cast this ability, and targets do not have to be visible to be affected.
leveling: {{st|Physical Damage Per Stack|{{ap|15 to 35}} {{as|(+ 35% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Minimum Mixed Damage|{{ap|20+15 to 60+35}} {{as|(+ 35% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ {{fd|33.3}}% AP)}}|Maximum Mixed Damage|{{ap|20+15*6 to 60+35*6}} {{as|(+ 210% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ {{ap|33.3*6}}% AP)}}}}
skills.notes:
* '''Twitch''' is given a range indicator for ''Contaminate's'' radius upon infecting an enemy champion with {{ai|Deadly Venom|Twitch}} (actual range is slightly larger than shown in-game).
* ''Contaminate'' will not damage enemy targets whose {{ai|Deadly Venom|Twitch}} stacks wear off or if they move out of ''Contaminate's'' range before '''Twitch''' can cast.

effects.str:
• Physical Damage Per Stack: (+ 35% bonus AD)
  • Minimum Mixed Damage: (+ 35% bonus AD) (+ 33.3% AP)
  • Maximum Mixed Damage: (+ 210% bonus AD) (+ % AP)

st_slices: (+ 35% bonus AD) (+ 33.3% AP)

skills.name: Spray and Pray
skills.range: {{tip|er|icononly = true}} {{tt|1100|bolt travel distance, further increased by Rapid Firecannon}}
skills.blurb: Twitch unleashes the full power of his crossbow, shooting bolts over a great distance that pierce all enemies caught in their path.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Twitch''' gains {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack damage}}}} and {{sti|range|300 '''bonus''' attack range}} for 6 seconds, during which his {{tip|basic attack|basic attacks}} are replaced by ''bolts'' that travel slightly further than his attack range in a straight line, dealing damage to {{tt|every enemy unit|non-champions and champions, wards and plants, turrets and structures}} they collide with in their path.

The ''bolts'' deal {{pp|key=%|type=enemies hit|110-10*x|0 to 4 for 5|formula=100% - 10% per enemy hit. ''This is capped at 60% damage.''|changedisplay=true}} of the {{as|attack's damage|AD}}, apply {{tip|on-hit}} effects at 100% effectiveness to all targets and each attack can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} all its targets.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Twitch gains bonus attack damage and 300 bonus attack range for 6 seconds, during which his basic attacks are replaced by bolts that travel slightly further than his attack range in a straight line, dealing damage to every enemy unit they collide with in their path.
The bolts deal 0 to 4 for 5 ‒ undefined of the attack's damage, apply on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness to all targets and each attack can critically strike all its targets.
skills.notes:
* ''Spray and Pray'' allows '''Twitch''' to outrange {{tip|turret|turrets}} by 50 units, allowing him to hit them without them returning fire.
* There is a brief delay before the ''bolts'' reach targets at range due to finite missile speed, allowing even the primary target to physically dodge the attack.
* The ''bolt'' projectiles will naturally pass through terrain and enemy structures (the latter will be damaged by ''bolts'' even if they are not directly targeted).
* If '''Twitch''' is {{tip|blind|blinded}} before winding up the attack, the hits will ''miss'' against '''all''' targets.
* {{iis|Runaan's Hurricane}} {{nie|Wind's Fury}} interacts with ''Spray and Pray's'' {{sti|'''bonus''' attack range}} but not with the modified missile effect (the secondary bolts will not have pass-through effects).
* Whenever the ''bolts'' penetrate a target, a small elongated cloud appears at the location, which's VFX and SFX '''can''' be seen and heard inside the Fog of War.
* The ''bolts<nowiki>'</nowiki>'' travel distance scales with the fully value of '''Twitch's''' {{sti|range|attack range}} increases such as {{ii|Rapid Firecannon}}, but not with size increases (which only increase his effective attack range, thereby the target range).
* (Outdated as of [[V10.13]], now can hit everything with edge range, except for turrets) The {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} center of a unit must be within the maximum travel distance of the ''bolt'' missile, and in front of the spawn location ('''Twitch's''' {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} center) for the ''bolt'' to be able to hit them.
** Other than this condition, the ''bolt'' missile has to only touch (pass within its half width of 60 units) the {{tip|er|icononly = true}} edge of the unit's radius.
** This is standard behaviour for ''linear skillshots''.
